oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Situation und Ursachen von gegenseitigem Besaugen bei Kälbern in Gruppenhaltung
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Größbacher, Verena
Leeb, Christine
Winckler, Christoph
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dairy cattle
Beef cattle
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Non-nutritive sucking such as cross-sucking, inter-sucking and sucking and licking parts of the pen is an oral abnormal behaviour shown by calves. This study examines factors affecting non-nutritive sucking behaviour in organic group-housed Austrian Fleckvieh calves (n=37 farms), focusing on non-weaned calves under 8 weeks of age. Factors associated with sucking on housing equipment and inter/cross-sucking were at least partly different thus pointing at different underlying motivations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Größbacher, Verena; Leeb, Christine and Winckler, Christoph (2013) Situation und Ursachen von gegenseitigem Besaugen bei Kälbern in Gruppenhaltung. Paper at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
